Pair.String: Options for configuring PS3HEN updates, removal, and more
Developer options for switching modes, changing build type, and more
Themes must be first installed from Updater
You MUST reboot console after update has been installed
SFO Attribute to enables RemotePlay + SystemBGM on Disc Games with no Updates
http://localhost/dev_hdd0/tmp/hfw_settings.log (webMAN MOD is required for this function)
Saves filename and klicensee to log file
Writes save data name and file id key to log file
Retrieves disc hash key from an ORIGINAL game disc
Reboots and allows you to check and repair filesystem
Reboots with Database rebuilding flag set
Reboot to Recovery Mode (Not supported on NAND models!)
This will toggle on/off the automatic update of HEN on launch
This will disable the remapped files from mappath so these files can be managed
Switch between category_game.xml with and without seg_gamedebug
This toggles the 99% Package Install/Delete options under Package Manager
Toggle Hotkey Polling on HEN Launch
This will toggle on/off L2 and R2 button detection on HEN launch
This will toggle on/off the BT audio patch. May cause an issue with Sony BT headset Pulse
Users can toggle clearing History, Auth Cache, and Cookies on HEN launch
Users can toggle clearing CI.TMP, MI.TMP, and PTL.TMP on HEN launch
This will toggle on/off the file check to repair HEN files at /dev_hdd0/hen/ on HEN launch
This will remove PS3HEN from your system and restore OFW files, except silk_webkit.sprx
This will allow you to toggle between Release, Debug, and USB Modes
This will remove hen_enable.png and allow PS3HEN to be re-installed from browser
Enable Quick Preview Option On XMB
NOTE: The DEX version of explore_plugin.sprx will have visual artifacts on 4.89+
Allows reading rap.bin in conjunction with using RAP files
NOTE: This saves the exploited LV2 memory to a file, and is not a clean OFW dump
This changes build type to use alternate update and version check paths on server
NOTE: These REQUIRE using BadHTAB hardware glitch exploit, or toggle options the exploit can use
This is the default mode and is ideal for most users
This mode has debug output over UDP for developers and advanced users
This mode runs the release payload directly from a USB device (dev_usb000)
This mode runs the debug payload directly from a USB device (dev_usb001)
This mode runs a custom user payload *USE WITH CAUTION!*
This mode runs a custom user payload directly from a USB device *USE WITH CAUTION!*
NOTE: These are all experimental and should be used with caution
Copy BadHTAB log from dev_hdd0 to dev_usb000
Toggle LV2 Kernel SELF Reload After Exploitation
Toggle LV2 Kernel FSELF Reload After Exploitation
This will remove/clear CI.TMP from current user on HEN launch
This will remove/clear MI.TMP from current user on HEN launch
This will remove/clear PTL.TMP from current user on HEN launch
This will remove/clear history.xml from current user on HEN launch
This will remove/clear auth_cache.dat from current user on HEN launch
This will remove/clear cookie.dat from current user on HEN launch
